summary: 2002 DODGE DAKOTA QUAD CAB W/ 5.9 LITER ENGINE.  MY TRUCK SUFFERS FROM A SHAKY IDLE, VERY PREVALENT WHEN RELEASING THE BRAKE AND ROLLING.  IS WORSE AT COLD START UP.  I SUSPECT IGNITION SYSTEM= LOCATION OF COIL MAY BE THE CAUSE DUE TO BEING SO CLOSE TO THE TENSIONER PULLEY OR A OUT-OF BALANCE HARMONIC BALANCER.     *JB
